author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: N.J. Authorities Probing Possible Illegal U-Turn in Fatal Bus Crash
text:
Authorities on Friday were investigating whether the driver of a Paramus, N.J., school bus tried to make a U-turn into a restricted police turnaround lane prior to colliding with a dump truck, according to people familiar with the matter.
One of those people said Friday that authorities are reviewing video footage of the highway where one student and one teacher were killed. The accident occurred Thursday morning near Exit 25 on Interstate 80 in Mount Olive Township.
